channel.title: Ok um, could someone point me towards a npc drop tut?
channel.description: dear helping public, i cant seem to find a tut on how to make npcs drop items, plz either tell me how, or provide a link to a tut. sincerely, ~stup~

item.title: Ok um, could someone point me towards a npc drop tut?
item.dc:creator: @stupinator stupinator
item.description:
@stupinator wrote:

nvmd too late, i found one already cuz no one helped me, and samuraiblood2, no offense, but after how you flamed me in my tut, theres no way i would use one of your tutorials, just because im really depressed now

Read full topic
